headline.main: CIVILIAN TOLL 2,600 IN RANGOON RAIDS; Official Compares Bombing to That of London or Chungking -- Puts Deaths at 1,350 COOLIE PANIC IS CHECKED New Burma Road Rules Curb Commercial Trucks, Raise Hauls, Insure Security

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 31 -- Rangoon today ranks with Chungking and London as one of the most-bombed cities in the Allied world, said a high Burmese official who arrived here today.
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 31 -- Rangoon today ranks with Chungking and London as one of the most-bombed cities in the Allied world, said a high Burmese official who arrived here today....

byline.original: By HARRISON FORMANWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
